description:
Based in Ocean Springs, Mississippi, our attorney at Jeffrey Pierce Law, PLLC, provides criminal defense, personal injury and bankruptcy services to clients in Hattiesburg and throughout the Mississippi Gulf Coast area. Serving as an advocate for people as they navigate the range of legal challenges life may present, our law office helps clients achieve effective solutions to their cases as affordably and efficiently as possible. For our clients' convenience, we accept credit cards, and we offer free initial consultations.

Recognizing what is at stake for people when they are facing criminal charges, our law office is focused on protecting our clients' rights. Our attorney's experience includes representing people in cases involving issues such as DUI, drug offenses and violent crimes. We have successfully obtained acquittals and dismissals, as well as pleaded down charges, on behalf of those we represent.

Whether they have been injured in motor vehicle accidents, while working on construction sites, due to medical malpractice or as a result of other such negligence, we know those who have suffered personal injuries may face a range of challenges. Our attorney uses his nearly 20 years of legal experience to aggressively advocate on behalf of our clients. We keep the best interests of those we represent in mind as our law office explores every avenue toward helping them recover the maximum compensation for their injuries.

When it comes to dealing with substantial debt, our team at Jeffrey Pierce Law, PLLC, understands that people may feel embarrassed and overwhelmed. We offer compassionate, yet straightforward, guidance. Our attorney explains their rights and options, including the potential risks and benefits of each, to clients. It is our goal to empower people, so they can make confident and informed decisions regarding their situations.

Jeffrey Pierce Law, PLLC, is a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
